section.title: Test Script Source Tree Location
section.p: Descriptions of the test cases in this test suite can be found at the following location:

section.title: Test Script EPOC tree Location
section.p: When the tests are built for emulator or hardware (winscw or armv5), the script is exported into the following location in the epoc tree.

section.title: Test Script Build Location
section.p: When the tests are built, the scripts are built into the following location
Note: When the tests are built to be executed on hardware the files are built into the z: drive of the ROM.

section.title: Test .driver File
section.p: is used by the test driver to construct the test suite tree structure and export all the appropriate files to the correct location in the epoc32 tree and on the device.
When the tests are built, the .driver file can be found in the following location:
